body.name: Pvillez Convertible Crib, 4-in-1 Convertible Crib, Farmhouse Style Baby Crib Converts to Toddler Bed, Daybed and Full Size Bed, Easy Assembly (Washed Gray)
features: Farmhouse Style Design: The collection in Vintage Chestnut finish lends a nod to the style of industrial farmhouse. Clean lines and light distressing shows this collection has the longevity to last.

4-in-1 Convertible Crib: The convertible crib can easily convert to a daybed and toddler bed with the purchase of addiitional guard-rail. Or as your child outgrows the crib you can convert to a full size bed using a Hollywood frame.
Thoughtfully Crafted: Pvillez 4-in-1 Convertible Crib is crafted with sustainable New Zealand Pinewood, with a non-toxic finish. It also ensures easy maintenance and a no-hassle assembly.

Safe and Reliable: This must-have convertible crib is designed with safe slats which is strong and sturdy, environmentally friendly and odorless. Create a comfortable and healthy growth environment for your baby.

2 Colors Available: This sturdy crib is available in 2 classic finishes Vintage Chestnut & Washed Gray. Our Baby crib bring a sophisticated and tasteful mid-century modern aura to your baby’s nursery.
body.description: Pvillez 4-in-1 Convertible Crib in Washed Gray A crib that evolves with your baby - Pvillez 4-in-1 Convertible Crib features clean, simple lines, shiplap details, and unique wood grain. Its gender-neutral and timeless styling makes it an excellent fit for a variety of decor themes. - The Pvillez is available in two sophisticated finishes - Vintage Chestnut and Washed Gray. - Built with durable materials and timeless styles that seamlessly transition from nursery to big kids room. - Once your child outgrows the crib, convert it to a toddler bed, daybed or sofa. Specifications： Main Color: Washed Gray Main Material: Wood Crib Dimensions: 54.00" L x 29.25"W x 43.50"H Product Weight: 48LBS Weight Capacity: 100LBS

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pvillez 4-in-1 Convertible Crib, Farmhouse Style Baby Crib Converts to Toddler Bed, Daybed and Full Size Bed, Easy Assembly

Bring the joy and versatility of a mini crib into a parents bedroom, shared nursery or small space without compromising on style. It's suitable for a newborn to beyond 18 months.Creating a healthier environment for your baby to sleep, play, and grow. What You Get？ 1 x 4-in-1 Convertible Crib 1 x Assembly Accessories 1 x Assembly Instructions Pvillez 4-in-1 Convertible Crib in Washed Gray A crib that evolves with your baby - Pvillez 4-in-1 Convertible Crib features clean, simple lines, shiplap details, and unique wood grain. Its gender-neutral and timeless styling makes it an excellent fit for a variety of decor themes. - The Pvillez is available in two sophisticated finishes - Vintage Chestnut and Washed Gray. - Built with durable materials and timeless styles that seamlessly transition from nursery to big kids room. - Once your child outgrows the crib, convert it to a toddler bed, daybed or sofa. Specifications： Main Color: Washed Gray Main Material: Wood Crib Dimensions: 54.00" L x 29.25"W x 43.50"H Product Weight: 48LBS Weight Capacity: 100LBS

Washed Gray Finish Farmhouse style, perfect for most homes, adding a touch of glamour to your new home. Safety Slat Design Safe guardrail spacing, will not jam baby's fingers and head, enhance the protection of baby. Sturdy & Durable Bed Slats Safely reinforced bottom plate, stable load-bearing, up to 100 pounds, allowing your children to jump in the group and release their vitality.

High Quality Wood Made of high-quality wood, high density, beautiful wood grain, not easy to crack, safe and green, and can be used for a long time. Quality Craftsmanship Combining traditional woodworking technology with modern production, it has undergone multiple processes to control every detail of production, just to make a good product. Perfect Gift for Kids The multi-functional crib is strong and durable, and has different uses in different growth periods of the child, and accompanies the child every day of growth. It is the best gift for kids.

Crib This crib is designed to accommodate your growing child. You can place a soft mattress on it to create a warm and comfortable environment for your newborn. Toddler Bed With or without a safety guardrail, this crib will grow with your child as they transition into a toddler bed. The toddler bed stage is recommended once your child surpasses the height of 35 inches. Safety guardrail is sold separately. Daybed For added versatility, and as your child continues to grow, this crib converts into a daybed. Full-Sized Bed This crib will last well into adolescence as it converts into a full-size bed with headboard and footboard. Mattress and Full-Size Crib Metal Bed Frame Conversion Kit are sold separately.
